We must assume that your function that returns void actually does something,...so instead of testing the return of the method, you test the effect of your method - think along the lines of "does it change the state of something else in your object that can be tested"?

-------------- Original message -------------- 
From: abhishek sao <abhishek_sao@...> 
  Hi all,
   
  I have just started using junit. I need to know that is there any way by which i can test a void method? The only test cases I have written till now were for methods that returned some methods and i used to check the value using assertequals(). But how do I do it for a void function. 
   
  Somebody, please help me...
